title: Bats and rice: Quantifying the role of insectivorous bats as agricultural pest suppressors in rice fields
content:
Publication date: April 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 66

Author(s): Carme Tuneu-Corral, Xavier Puig-Montserrat, Carles Flaquer, Vanessa A. Mata, Hugo Rebelo, Mar Cabeza, Adrià López-Baucells
